Variable.name: event
Variable.Description: The IdentityChangeEvent. It can be used to build the provisioning plan, but does not need to be persisted with the case, so marked as transient.

Variable.name: trace
Variable.Description: Used for debugging this workflow and when set to true trace will be sent to stdout.

Variable.name: project
Variable.Description: ProvisioningProject which is just a compiled version of the ProvisioningPlan.

Variable.name: identityStatus
Variable.Description: Check User Status value for identity

Variable.name: flow
Variable.Description: Get flow based on USer status

Variable.name: approvalScheme
Variable.Description: No Approval required when Ststus Changed from Active

Step.name: Enable Access Subprocess
Step.Description: Enable the account in the identity update workflow.

Step.name: Suspended or Withdrawn Subprocess
Step.Description: Disable the account in the identity update workflow.

Step.name: Finalize
Step.Description: Call the standard subprocess that can audit/finalize the request.
